entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 04:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Snow at times heavy near White Bay late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 15 cm near White Bay. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
